Class PolynomialDerivative

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList<Integer>
          • Polynomial
            • PolynomialDerivative
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<Integer>, Collection<Integer>, List<Integer>, RandomAccess

    public class PolynomialDerivative
extends Polynomial

    PolynomialDerivative calculate the derivative of input polynomial

    PolynomialDerivative allows users input data from console or command line

    PolynomialDerivative inherits from Polynomial class.

    `
    Version:
    UCSB, CS56, F17
    Author:
    Siyao Li
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
